message: I have a great product for you, Bob. I think you'll really like it. I'm willing to let it go for $150.
Thank you for offering the product, Alice. I appreciate your effort. I am willing to pay $120 for it.
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I'm now offering the product for $135.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. I would like to counter with an offer of $120 for the product.
I'm not willing to go down to $120, Bob. I'm thinking more along the lines of $140. I'm confident you'll find it's a fair price for a great product.
I understand your position, Alice. I would like to counter with an offer of $130 for the product.
I'm getting close to my minimum, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $137.50. I think that's a fair price for a product of this quality.
Considering the value of the product, I believe $135 would be a fair price for you to consider.
I'm not quite there yet, Bob. I'm willing to compromise, but I need to make a bit more than $135. I'm thinking $142.50 is a fair price for this product.
I appreciate your efforts, Alice. Considering the value and condition of the product, I believe $140 would be a fair price.
